titleStmt.title: True lovers extremity; or, The maidens miserable moan. This charming fair, through deep dispair, did end her days in grief: to death alone, she made her moan, who yielded her relief.To the tune of, Charon make hast, &c. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby at the Golden Ball in Pye-corner.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "I having an hour of time and leisure ..."
Date, place of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproductions of originals in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
